pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Sportradar APILightweight wrapper for [Sportradar API](https://developer.sportradar.com/docs/read/Home)## Set up1. Generate an API Key## Installation````bashpip install sportradar-api````## Usage````pythonfrom sportradar_api import SoccerExtendedsportradar = SoccerExtended(api_key='SPORTRADAR_API_KEY')````
